name: kriedko-feedback-react
description: Kriedko Culinary Collective Feedback Form - React App

scripts.test-db: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const { supabaseAdmin } = require('./lib/supabase'); supabaseAdmin.from('feedback_submissions').select('count').then(({data, error}) => { if (error) console.error('❌ Database error:', error.message); else console.log('✅ Database connected! Records:', data?.length || 0); process.exit(error ? 1 : 0); });"
